changes: Added compatibility with esx_context and ox_lib menu
PlayerData loading for qb-core has been improved
Added Config.EnemiesPedsVisibleForAll - so every player will see enemy peds
Added groups for enemy peds - this means I won't shoot at each other
Added Config.MinimumPolice to the ability to set a minimum number of police officers.
Added ability to set the addition of public ped with missions, no longer required for gangs only.
Improve for QB-Core to load Player gang and vehicle spawns for missions
